Body: In this accepted answer user @Parth Mehrotra writes:  You can't really change the things camera intent has to offer, and if  you do find a device where the camera app would let you access the  gallery I wouldn't depend on it.I am a user of the BuitenBeter app. With this app Dutch civilians can easily report issues to their municipality by taking pictures. The app offers me only the possibility to upload pictures from the camera and not from the gallery. I spend several hours looking for an app which I would name Camera2Gallery, which would appear as a extra option in the screenshot below. Does it exist? Can it be easily made? I think there is a real big need.
Title: Is there a camera app which would let you access the gallery?

history.Text: In [this accepted answer](http://stackoverflow.com/a/12483868/903186) user [@Parth Mehrotra](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1060955/parth-mehrotra) writes:> You can't really change the things camera intent has to offer, and if> you do find a device where the **camera app would let you access the> gallery** I wouldn't depend on it.I am a user of the [BuitenBeter](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yucat.buitenbeter) app. With the app Dutch civilians can easily report issues to their muncipality by taking pictures. **The app offers me only the possibility to upload pictures from the camera and not from the gallery.** I spend several hours looking for an app which I would name `Camera2Gallery`, which would appear as a extra option in the screenshot below. Does it exist? Can it be easily made? I think there is a real big need. [mockup of where Camera2Gallery should appear](http://www.allepeilingen.com/sharedImages/Camera2Gallery.png)
Is there a camera app which would let you access the gallery?

history.Comment: show up the image in post, edited body
history.Text: In [this accepted answer](http://stackoverflow.com/a/12483868/903186) user [@Parth Mehrotra](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1060955/parth-mehrotra) writes:> You can't really change the things camera intent has to offer, and if> you do find a device where the **camera app would let you access the> gallery** I wouldn't depend on it.I am a user of the [BuitenBeter](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yucat.buitenbeter) app. With this app Dutch civilians can easily report issues to their municipality by taking pictures. **The app offers me only the possibility to upload pictures from the camera and not from the gallery.** I spend several hours looking for an app which I would name `Camera2Gallery`, which would appear as a extra option in the screenshot below. ![enter image description here][1] Does it exist? Can it be easily made? I think there is a real big need.  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/TqigM.png
